responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "FA3D5B25470BCDFBCD79289A403F9283", "The stewardship of the Riverlands is bestowed by the scions, and the bearer of that fabled ring would be its protector. Everything you see here is their domain. As descendants of the Aela, the Kaelar had liberated this nation. They fought tooth and nail for it, wrestled it out of the hands of Titans, and kept it. And it\'s theirs as long as they rule over it, you see, how the Kaelar seize power from their predecessors. However, they cannot perceive it the way we Vaelune see it. You might say we have a refined taste for the sublime.")
name: CSQ_DialDef_0013_AkhundBahrani_Ring_26
